name: House Scene - Demo
description:
This is a demo scene for a house setting for a school project. I used it to start experimenting with setting design and AI implementation.

Assets used:

Furniture - Bed & Bath Furniture (PepperJack), HDRP Furniture Pack (Tridify), Toon Furniture (Elcanetay)

Framed Pictures - Frames With Pictures (3Dfrk)

Trees, grass texture and bushes - Nature Starter Kit2 (Shapes)

Rock textures - Rocks and Boulders 2 (Manufacture K4)
